data.title: AN EXTREMELY ENJOYABLE DISH OF PASTA
data.text: I stopped by with friends that had dined here at an earlier time and found the restaurant to be one little awesome eatery. We all  had their angel-hair pasta with Sal's extraordinary meat sauce and found it to be not only a more than ample but an above average tasty dish of pasta. Add the complimentary glass of red or white wine or a cold bottle of beer if you chose, their endless basket of garlic sticks and you end up having one heck of a satisfying lunch or dinner. Left with my friends and vowed that we'd all be back for another get together at Little Sal's on Roth Avenue. An incredibly friendly and attentive staff helps that from the time you walk in until you leave, just makes you want to return to this little best kept secret of the Lehigh Valley. You won't be rushed through the time you spend here which at times has been a problem at some of the dining spots we've been to in the past. It's a must to put Little Sal's on your list and you won't ever regret stopping for one fine plate of pasta.

data.title: These people are awesome
data.text: Super friendly staff.  Best pizza in the area.  Their subs are good and their fries are amazing.  They are always willing to go the extra mile to keep you coming back.

data.title: Great place!
data.text: Thus is a wonderful place to eat, whether you eat in or take out.  The service is great, the food is good and so are the prices!  We plan on coming back when we're in the area again!
